name: Summer Bubbles
description:
You need to release bubbles and raise them. When they reach the required point, you get a new gel. You can merge specific bubbles to each other, increasing their lift and points. You can also catch FLYERS by increasing bubble scores as well.
For every 1000 points, 1 blow is given.

Rent in shots is charged for every minute. Every 5 minutes the rent increases by the original rate. For a zero level, the rent is 5 shots.

At the moment the game contains 20 levels, each level contains tasks (bubbles that must be created).

The game was created for mobile phones and contains appropriate controls.

PC Controls:
Left arrow - Tube movement to the left
Right arrow - Tube movement to the right
Space - Shout(Create bubble )
LShift - Blow
F5, R - reload scene

More information in the section About the Main Menu.
